name: Necro Immortallis
description: Indie horror game about a cruel escape from the artificial death lurking in the forest during World War 2.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/Vista/XP Processor: CPU Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 680 MB available space
